page.title: 05KINGMOOR HOUSING
page.content: {KINGMOOR HOUSING The houses on Lowry Hill are made from brick and the roofs,slate & tile. Some of the houses have been standing for ten years and are still being built. Newfield Estate consists of flats, houses and bungalows.The windows are neo-Georgian and arched.The estate was first planned in 1977 and Eden Construction Ltd started building in 1978. It was named after a farm. Another estate is Moorville which consists of some houses made of smooth stone & others of pebbledash & stucco.The houses at Kingstown, Cargo and Harker are mostly older.Harker consists of houses made up of pebbledash and stucco.The windows are post-war & the roofs are tiled. Kingstown, Cargo and Harker are all small villages.
